    • Constructor Detail

      • Champion

        public Champion()

    • Method Detail

      • isActive

        public boolean isActive()
        Returns:
        true if the champion is currently active (available to play), false otherwise

      • isBotEnabled

        public boolean isBotEnabled()
        Returns:
        true if the bot enabled flag is enabled (only applies for custom games), false otherwise

      • isBotMmEnabled

        public boolean isBotMmEnabled()
        Returns:
        true if the bot match made flag is enabled (only applies to Co-op vs. AI games), false otherwise

      • getId

        public long getId()
        Returns:
        the champion ID. This ID can be used with the static data API to get more information about the champion

      • isFreeToPlay

        public boolean isFreeToPlay()
        Returns:
        true if the champion is free to play, false otherwise. Free to play champions rotate so this will not always return the same value

      • isRankedPlayEnabled

        public boolean isRankedPlayEnabled()
        Returns:
        true if the champion is enabled in ranked, false otherwise
